title: Oxfam CEO apologizes over abuse comments
text:
Oxfam CEO apologizes over abuse comments 12:05am IST - 01:38 
Oxfam's chief executive apologized on Tuesday for saying a wave of condemnation over sex abuse by its staff was disproportionate as it had not ''murdered babies in their cots'' after a scandal that has prompted new reports of abuse.   
Oxfam's chief executive apologized on Tuesday for saying a wave of condemnation over sex abuse by its staff was disproportionate as it had not "murdered babies in their cots" after a scandal that has prompted new reports of abuse.  //reut.rs/2EQz0j7
